message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $11,500.
Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I'm hoping to get a better price.  I'm willing to pay $10,500 for the product.  Let's see if we can find a middle ground.

I understand you're looking for a better deal, Bob. I can see we're close on the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll counteroffer $11,000 for the product. Let's see if we can finalize the deal.
